item.text: The tribal leaders of the Levites went before Eleazar the priest and Joshua son of Nun and the Israelite tribal leaders
in Shiloh in the land of Canaan and said, “The Lord told Moses to assign us cities in which to live along with the grazing areas for our cattle.”
So the Israelites assigned these cities and their grazing areas to the Levites from their own holdings, as the Lord had instructed.
The first lot belonged to the Kohathite clans. The Levites who were descendants of Aaron the priest were allotted 13 cities from the tribes of Judah, Simeon, and Benjamin.

The <st data-num="03498" class="">rest</st> of <st data-num="06955" class="">Kohath’s</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> were <st data-num="01486" class="">allotted</st> <st data-num="06235" class="">ten</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> from the <st data-num="04940" class="">clans</st> of the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="0669" class="">Ephraim</st>, and from the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="01835" class="">Dan</st> and the <st data-num="02677" class="">half</st>-<st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="04519" class="">Manasseh</st>.

<st data-num="01648" class="">Gershon’s</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> were <st data-num="01486" class="">allotted</st> <st data-num="07969 06240">13</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> from the <st data-num="04940" class="">clans</st> of the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="03485" class="">Issachar</st>, and from the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribes</st> of <st data-num="0836" class="">Asher</st> and <st data-num="05321" class="">Naphtali</st> and the <st data-num="02677" class="">half</st>-<st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="04519" class="">Manasseh</st> in <st data-num="01316" class="">Bashan</st>.

<st data-num="04847" class="">Merari’s</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> by their <st data-num="04940" class="">clans</st> were allotted <st data-num="08147 06240">12</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> from the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribes</st> of <st data-num="07205" class="">Reuben</st>, <st data-num="01410" class="">Gad</st>, and <st data-num="02074" class="">Zebulun</st>.
So the Israelites assigned to the Levites by lot these cities and their grazing areas, as the Lord had instructed Moses.
They assigned from the tribes of Judah and Simeon the cities listed below.

(They <st data-num="01961" class="">were</st> assigned to the <st data-num="06956" class="">Kohathite</st> <st data-num="04940" class="">clans</st> of the <st data-num="01121 0378">Levites</st> who were <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="0175" class="">Aaron</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="07223" class="">first</st> <st data-num="01486" class="">lot</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">fell</st> to <st data-num="01992" class="">them</st>.)

They <st data-num="05414" class="">assigned</st> <st data-num="01992" class="">them</st> <st data-num="07153" class="">Kiriath Arba</st> (Arba was the <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> of <st data-num="06061" class="">Anak</st>), <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> is, <st data-num="02275" class="">Hebron</st>, in the <st data-num="02022" class="">hill country</st> of <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st>, along with its <st data-num="05439" class="">surrounding</st> <st data-num="04054" class="">grazing areas</st>.

(Now the <st data-num="05892" class="">city’s</st> <st data-num="07704" class="">fields</st> and surrounding <st data-num="02691" class="">towns</st> they had <st data-num="05414" class="">assigned</st> to <st data-num="03612" class="">Caleb</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="03312" class="">Jephunneh</st> as his <st data-num="0272" class="">property</st>.)

So to the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="0175" class="">Aaron</st> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> they <st data-num="05414" class="">assigned</st> <st data-num="02275" class="">Hebron</st> (a <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> of <st data-num="04733" class="">refuge</st> for one who <st data-num="07523" class="">committed manslaughter</st>), <st data-num="03841" class="">Libnah</st>,
<st data-num="03492" class="">Jattir</st>, <st data-num="0851" class="">Eshtemoa</st>,
<st data-num="02473" class="">Holon</st>, <st data-num="01688" class="">Debir</st>,

<st data-num="05871" class="">Ain</st>, <st data-num="03194" class="">Juttah</st>, and <st data-num="01053" class="">Beth Shemesh</st>, along with the <st data-num="04054" class="">grazing areas</st> of each—a total of <st data-num="08672" class="">nine</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> taken <st data-num="0854" class="">from</st> <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="07626" class="">tribes</st>.

From the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="01144" class="">Benjamin</st> they assigned<n id="1" /> <st data-num="01391" class="">Gibeon</st>, <st data-num="01387" class="">Geba</st>,

<st data-num="06068" class="">Anathoth</st>, and <st data-num="05960" class="">Almon</st>, along with the <st data-num="04054" class="">grazing areas</st> of each—a total of <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st>.
The priests descended from Aaron received 13 cities and their grazing areas.
The rest of the Kohathite clans of the Levites were allotted cities from the tribe of Ephraim.

They <st data-num="05414" class="">assigned</st> them <st data-num="07927" class="">Shechem</st> (a <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> of <st data-num="04733" class="">refuge</st> for one who <st data-num="07523" class="">committed manslaughter</st>) in the <st data-num="02022" class="">hill country</st> of <st data-num="0669" class="">Ephraim</st>, <st data-num="01507" class="">Gezer</st>,

<st data-num="06911" class="">Kibzaim</st>, and <st data-num="01032" class="">Beth Horon</st>, along with the <st data-num="04054" class="">grazing areas</st> of each—a total of <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st>.
From the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="01835" class="">Dan</st> they assigned <st data-num="0514" class="">Eltekeh</st>, <st data-num="01405" class="">Gibbethon</st>,

<st data-num="0357" class="">Aijalon</st>, and <st data-num="01667" class="">Gath Rimmon</st>, along with the <st data-num="04054" class="">grazing areas</st> of each—a total of <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st>.

From the <st data-num="04276" class="">half</st>-<st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="04519" class="">Manasseh</st> they assigned <st data-num="08590" class="">Taanach</st> and <st data-num="01667" class="">Gath Rimmon</st>,<n id="1" /> along with the <st data-num="04054" class="">grazing areas</st> of each—a total of <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st>.
The rest of the Kohathite clans received 10 cities and their grazing areas.

They assigned to the Gershonite clans of the Levites the following cities: from the half-tribe of Manasseh: Golan in Bashan (a city of refuge for one who committed manslaughter) and Beeshtarah, along with the grazing areas of each—a total of two cities;
from the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="03485" class="">Issachar</st>: <st data-num="07191" class="">Kishon</st>, <st data-num="01705" class="">Daberath</st>,

<st data-num="03412" class="">Jarmuth</st>, and <st data-num="05873" class="">En Gannim</st>, along with the <st data-num="04054" class="">grazing areas</st> of each—a total of <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st>;
from the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="0836" class="">Asher</st>: <st data-num="04861" class="">Mishal</st>, <st data-num="05658" class="">Abdon</st>,

<st data-num="02520" class="">Helkath</st>, and <st data-num="07340" class="">Rehob</st>, along with the <st data-num="04054" class="">grazing areas</st> of each—a total of <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st>;

from the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="05321" class="">Naphtali</st>: <st data-num="06943" class="">Kedesh</st> in <st data-num="01551" class="">Galilee</st> (a <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> of <st data-num="04733" class="">refuge</st> for one who <st data-num="07523" class="">committed manslaughter</st>), <st data-num="02576" class="">Hammoth Dor</st>, and <st data-num="07178" class="">Kartan</st>, along with the <st data-num="04054" class="">grazing areas</st> of each—a total of <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st>.
The Gershonite clans received 13 cities and their grazing areas.
They assigned to the Merarite clans (the remaining Levites) the following cities: from the tribe of Zebulun: Jokneam, Kartah,

<st data-num="01829" class="">Dimnah</st>, and <st data-num="05096" class="">Nahalal</st>, along with the <st data-num="04054" class="">grazing areas</st> of each—a total of <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st>;
<n id="1" /> from the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="07205" class="">Reuben</st>: <st data-num="01221" class="">Bezer</st>, <st data-num="03096" class="">Jahaz</st>,

<st data-num="06932" class="">Kedemoth</st>, and <st data-num="04158" class="">Mephaath</st>, along with the <st data-num="04054" class="">grazing areas</st> of each—a total of <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st>;

from the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="01410" class="">Gad</st>: <st data-num="07433" class="">Ramoth</st> in <st data-num="01568" class="">Gilead</st> (a <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> of <st data-num="04733" class="">refuge</st> for one who <st data-num="07523" class="">committed manslaughter</st>), <st data-num="04266" class="">Mahanaim</st>,

<st data-num="02809" class="">Heshbon</st>, and <st data-num="03270" class="">Jazer</st>, along with the <st data-num="04054" class="">grazing areas</st> of each—a <st data-num="03605" class="">total</st> of <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st>.
The Merarite clans (the remaining Levites) were allotted 12 cities.
The Levites received within the land owned by the Israelites 48 cities in all and their grazing areas.
Each of these cities had grazing areas around it; they were alike in this regard.
So the Lord gave Israel all the land he had solemnly promised to their ancestors, and they conquered it and lived in it.
The Lord made them secure, in fulfillment of all he had solemnly promised their ancestors. None of their enemies could resist them. The Lord handed all their enemies over to them.
Not one of the Lord’s faithful promises to the family of Israel was left unfulfilled; every one was realized.
